desc: Welcome to the best little lingerie shop in Chester. Established over 30 years, we're specialists in all things lingerie and customer service. We offer a wide selection of quality lingerie, swimwear and accessories to suit every body. Whether you are looking for everyday, post-surgery or occasional, we've got you!

layout.text: Firstly, welcome to our website, we're so pleased you found us. Please feel free to have a browse, and don't hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions or need any help with your purchase. We're only a phone call or message away, and the last thing we want is for you to be one of the 80% of women wearing the wrong sized bra!
